title: One Piece: Ruluka Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Comprehensive review and analysis of the Ruluka Island Arc, rating it 4.5/10. Discusses the arc's weaknesses including pacing issues, confusing logic, and its placement between two major canon arcs.

title: One Piece Diaries #19 – Ruluka Island
author: COMICON Staff
description: A first-time viewer's perspective on the Ruluka Island Arc, providing detailed episode-by-episode commentary on the storyline and characters.

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 1 -- Dragons, Goats and Rainbow Mists
author: Blackjack
description: Fan analysis and critique of early One Piece filler arcs including the Ruluka Island/Rainbow Mist Arc. Discusses the arc's shortcomings and why it's considered one of the weaker filler arcs.

title: One Piece – Rainbow Mist Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: TV Tropes page analyzing the narrative tropes and storytelling elements of the Rainbow Mist Arc, with focus on character dynamics and plot devices.
